languages.text: "Осколки пестрой лжи пронзили его разум и душу. Цвета, искаженные отчаянием и Имматериумом, уже никогда не станут прежними".
"His mind and soul are pierced by shards of a colourful deception. Hues once twisted by despair and the Immaterium's influence can never be the same again."
languages.original_text: "Осколки пестрой лжи пронзили его разум и душу. Цвета, искаженные отчаянием и Имматериумом, уже никогда не станут прежними".

traits.locale_text: "His mind and soul are pierced by shards of a colourful lie. Hues once twisted by despair and the Immaterium's influence can never be the same again."
"His mind and soul are pierced by shards of a colourful lie. Hues once twisted by despair and the Immaterium's influence can never be the same again."
"His mind and soul are pierced by shards of a colourful deception. Hues once twisted by despair and the Immaterium's influence can never be the same again."

"His mind and soul are pierced by shards of a colourful deception. Hues once twisted by despair and the Immaterium's influence can never be the same again."
"His mind and soul are pierced by shards of a colourful deception. Hues once twisted by despair and the Immaterium's influence can never be the same again."

languages.text: "Sein Geist und seine Seele sind durchbohrt von Splittern farbenfroher Täuschung. Von Verzweiflung verwirbelte Töne und der Einfluss des Immateriums lassen nicht zu, dass es je wieder so wird wie zuvor."
languages.original_text: "His mind and soul are pierced by shards of a colourful deception. Hues once twisted by despair and the Immaterium's influence can never be the same again."

traits.locale_text: "Sein Geist und seine Seele sind durchbohrt von Splittern farbenfroher Täuschung. Von Verzweiflung verwirbelte Töne und der Einfluss des Immateriums lassen nicht zu, dass es je wieder so wird wie zuvor."

languages.text: « Des fragments colorés par la tromperie transpercent son esprit et son âme. Après avoir été dénaturées par le désespoir et l'influence de l'Immaterium, les couleurs ne sont plus jamais les mêmes. »
languages.original_text: "His mind and soul are pierced by shards of a colourful deception. Hues once twisted by despair and the Immaterium's influence can never be the same again."

traits.locale_text: « Des fragments colorés par la tromperie transpercent son esprit et son âme. Après avoir été dénaturées par le désespoir et l'influence de l'Immaterium, les couleurs ne sont plus jamais les mêmes. »

languages.text: “色彩斑斓的碎片，带着欺骗的毒素，刺穿了他的灵魂与思想。他的颜色被亚空间的绝望扭曲，再也无法恢复原本的样子了。”
languages.original_text: "His mind and soul are pierced by shards of a colourful deception. Hues once twisted by despair and the Immaterium's influence can never be the same again."

traits.locale_text: “色彩斑斓的碎片，带着欺骗的毒素，刺穿了他的灵魂与思想。他的颜色被亚空间的绝望扭曲，再也无法恢复原本的样子了。”

languages.text: 「彼の精神と魂は、多彩な欺瞞の破片で刺し貫かれています。一度絶望と非物質世界の影響で歪められた色は二度と元には戻りません」
languages.original_text: "His mind and soul are pierced by shards of a colourful deception. Hues once twisted by despair and the Immaterium's influence can never be the same again."

traits.locale_text: 「彼の精神と魂は、多彩な欺瞞の破片で刺し貫かれています。一度絶望と非物質世界の影響で歪められた色は二度と元には戻りません」

languages.text: «Su mente y alma están perforados con fragmentos de una colorida decepción. Los tonos vuelven a estar retorcidos por la desesperación, y la influencia del Inmaterio nunca volverá a ser la misma».
languages.original_text: "His mind and soul are pierced by shards of a colourful deception. Hues once twisted by despair and the Immaterium's influence can never be the same again."

traits.locale_text: «Su mente y alma están perforados con fragmentos de una colorida decepción. Los tonos vuelven a estar retorcidos por la desesperación, y la influencia del Inmaterio nunca volverá a ser la misma».

languages.text: "Zihni ve ruhu, renkli bir aldatmacanın parçalarıyla delinmiş. Umutsuzluk ve Tindiyar'ın etkisiyle çarpılmış tonlar bir daha özüne dönemez."
languages.original_text: "His mind and soul are pierced by shards of a colourful deception. Hues once twisted by despair and the Immaterium's influence can never be the same again."

traits.locale_text: "Zihni ve ruhu, renkli bir aldatmacanın parçalarıyla delinmiş. Umutsuzluk ve Tindiyar'ın etkisiyle çarpılmış tonlar bir daha özüne dönemez."
